node.text: No sudden moves.~ Keep your eyes moving, lack-salt.~ I don't think we have business.~ I can see through you. I can't walk through you. Stand aside.~ Am I being halted for a reason?~ Accosted by another lack-salt in need of attention.~ Remove your attention from me before I am forced to remove it for you.

One shot, one kill? That's quitter talk.~ As many slugs as it takes, from as far as I can get.~ You're a bit close, lack-salt.~ Back up, lack-salt.~ Not a fan of company.~ Should you be over here? Must you be?~ Don't spoil my campsite.~ I didn't train for this so I could listen to strangers talk.
Eh.~ Hm?~ Mm.~ Hmph.~ Ugh.~ Go away.~ Trundle on, salt-pup.~ Rather not talk.~ Leave me be, pup.~ You're courting a slap from my staff.
